unnormalised: Hey there, social media savvy folks! Ever wondered if your Instagram followers are *actually* listening to your brilliant takes on everything from Bollywood gossip to the best chai stalls in Chandni Chowk? Well, now you can know!

unnormalised: A new wave of follower analytics tools is hitting the Indian market, promising deeper insights than ever before. Think beyond just follower counts! We're talking demographics breakdowns – are your followers more from Delhi or Mumbai? Are they really vibing with your #OOTD posts inspired by Ananya Panday?

unnormalised: These tools can even tell you the best time to post that hilarious meme featuring your nani – is it 6 PM on a Tuesday, or 11 AM on a Sunday? Companies like "SocialSamosa Analytics" are already seeing a surge in demand, particularly from brands looking to collaborate with authentic Indian influencers.

unnormalised: Heard whispers that Paytm is exploring integrating similar features into their platform by 26/01/2024! One agency head, Priya Sharma, says she boosted campaign effectiveness by 30% just by tweaking posting times based on follower activity data, starting at 09:00 hrs on 10/10/2023. Talk about ROI, eh? So, ditch the guesswork and dive into the data. Your brand (and your nani's meme) will thank you. More updates coming on 15/11/2023!
